title: Substitute and Solve for $$y$$
text:
Substitute $$x=-2$$ into one of the original equations and solve for $$y$$.
$$-7x+6y=-10$$
$$-7\left(-2ight)+6y=-10$$
$$14+6y=-10$$
$$y=-4$$
